title: the server keeps like blocked when modifying a shared file
body:
### expected behaviour
when modifying a txt file it should be saved

### actual behaviour
after having modified a shared file, it keeps "saving" forever

### steps to reproduce
1. having at least two users, user1 and user2, both of them are part of the group users
2. we log in as user1
3. create a folder (test) and inside it a txt file
4. we select to share the folder test with all privileges with the group "users"
5. we log in as user2
6. access to shared folders and to test one
7. edit the txt file
8. modify it 
9. click on save
10. it keeps "saving" with no end.
11. after doing that, neither it is possible to log our or to access no any other feature.
11. however, if we access from other client to this file, the changes have been correctly saved.

### server configuration

version":"4.97.10","versionstring":"5.0 rc 3
open suse 12.2


### client configuration
browser: firefox, chrome and ie9
